items.content:
Hi Zexi, 

Thank you for your question. 

Links are not supported on TikTok LIve rooms due to safety and security reasons. Clients cannot post links on the LIVE chat. The only way of have links is on the bio, as you mentioned. This is what other clients did in the past. There is no other solution. 

If you have further questions about this matter, please feel free to re-open this ticket. 

Best,. 

Itay Filiba, MPO LIVE

Hey Itay,


Thanks for the insight provided. However, client would really wish to run the livestream on TikTok, can I also check whether the following two ways are eligible based on your expertise:


  1. Instead of link, can we also show QR code in the screen and ask users to scan and open in their devices?
  2. Is there any way that allow the livestreamer host a lucky draw during live streaming? if so what would the usual user journey looks like?
  3. Understanding that we have the profile card function when user clicks on the other user's comment, can we have this scenario: while creator hosting the livestream, Alipay+'s official social account regularly sending the comment to encourage audiences to click comments and view Alipay+'s profile card with the external link in bio also display there?


Looking forward to hearing from you, thank you!

adding on the point 3 in my last message:

user click on comment and profile card with link in bio pops up

HI Zexi, 

Thanks for your questions. Here are my answers: 


Hey Itay,


Thanks for the insight provided. However, client would really wish to run the livestream on TikTok, can I also check whether the following two ways are eligible based on your expertise:


Instead of link, can we also show QR code in the screen and ask users to scan and open in their devices?

According to the TikTok Community Guidelines, QR codes are not allowed on Live Stream. If your client uses it, there is a risk of the live stream being banned by TnS. Sometimes when advertisers run CI to LIVE campaign with ad budget of more than $5,000 for a live stream, you can apply for TnS copyright protection for this advertiser. This protection might protect your advertisers when showing QR code, but cannot be guarantied.
However, it does not make sense to show QR code from the user journey aspect. The user watches the live stream on their mobile device. They can't scan QR codes, unless the have a second mobile device to scan the QR code form the first device screen. 


Is there any way that allow the livestreamer host a lucky draw during live streaming? if so what would the usual user journey looks like?

Live host can share screen (if they have gaming access) or stream from their desktop (if they have the LIVE STUDIO or OBS LIVE access). However, nothing will be clickable. Also same there are same TnS concerns as mentioned above. 


Understanding that we have the profile card function when user clicks on the other user's comment, can we have this scenario: while creator hosting the livestream, Alipay+'s official social account regularly sending the comment to encourage audiences to click comments and view Alipay+'s profile card with the external link in bio also display there?

Link from the bio won't be displayed on this card. Also user can mistakenly click other users profile that commented on the chat. 


TikTok really don't want that any link to be available on TikTok LIVE due to legal, safety and security reasons. The only place that links can be found is on TikTok LIVE Shop. For this user will need a shop and catalog on TikTok. I won't be able to advice more on this, since this is not product we support at all. 


Advertisers that we support only have link on their bio, they usually use linktr.ee for this. No other option is available. This is TikTok's policy. 


Best, 

Itay, MPO LIVE

items.label: MPO LIVE helps advertisers go live on TikTok. Use this form to submit a question to the MPO LIVE team regarding live streaming on TikTok. This form is not for troubleshooting and bugs. For troubleshooting and bugs please use: Athena > TikTok Internal Tickets > Branding solutions > Livestream Traffic Solutions. ///Link to Athena Internal Tickets: https://vcp.to/atint
Question text
items.content:
Hi Team! My client Alipay+ would like to run the livestream on TikTok using KOL's TikTok account to share their travel experience, such as offline checking-in with attraction and restaurants that accept Alipay+ as payment method. However, client would like to drive users to perform the following actions:

1. jump to external wallet app to get free/paid coupon
2. host an lucky draw in the livestreaming room and win freebies 

Understanding that the only way we can drive user to external app/web is to put the link in the bio. However, client feels that the user journey is not very straight forward, and they are open to let users to collet coupon/participate lucky draw natively inside TikTok. Could you kindly advise me how we can achieve that and whether there is any previous case study? 

Thanks in advance!
